website_summaries.verdict: A nice-quality product from a reliable company. Works well and produces an even hole punch.
pros: Can punch up to 28 sheets at a time
Includes a guide to help keep the sheets even while punching
Solid construction on this reliable electric device
Easily produces uniform holes in your paper
A great tool for teachers or offices
cons: This model must be plugged in and can't run on batteries

customer_reviews.title: Workhorse hole punch!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this 2-hole punch for a few months now. I’d say I average about a ream of paper a day. If you keep the tray empty, and don’t try to do too many at once, this machine works great. I regularly punch 15+ sheets at a time and it has yet to jam on me. It definitely sounds like it’s working harder with a thick stack of paper, but it always gets the job done. It’s such an improvement over the manual punch I was using.
customer_reviews.author: RWK

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller jobs that require consistent hole placement
customer_reviews.text: This helps ensure pages are consistently punched in the same location, time after time. I have never counted the number of pages I put in the device, but have never come near the advertised capacity; I would rather punch 16 to 20 sheets, which are easily aligned within the device, than trying to align 28 sheets before running the device at capacity. Having recently used this to punch holes in over 120 sheets of quality paper that were put into a binder for presentation, the end result was a professional look with consistently aligned holes.
customer_reviews.author: James D

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I love that the entire setup is plug it in. Works perfectly for me but I noticed that with even 5 pages I with get some holes not fully punched. I can't image it doing the listed 28 sheets at once smoothly. My paper is a heavier weight - 60 - so it may be able to do 15 sheets of 20 weight okay. Not a problem for me since I just reduce the # of sheets I punch at once and would never do that many sheets. But if you truly expect or need it to punch 28 sheets at once you may want to purchase a higher level machine.
customer_reviews.author: Catlin

customer_reviews.title: Jammed after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I normally love Swingline electric hole punchers; this is the third one I've bought for my small business. But after a few months the left punch stopped retracting the paper after the punch. So the paper just stays in the machine instead of going into the waste compartment. I've tried to look up manuals to see how to fix the jam with no success. Waste of $129.
customer_reviews.author: AZCrimLawyer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Puncher - Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This unit works exactly as you want it to, and the only complaint I had was that it needs a little more solid edge catch when you are getting close to max sheets. I keep it to about 20 sheets and it works great. Very clean and easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: The Edge

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT! SAVES ME SO MUCH TIME. A BIY PRICEY BUT WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted one of these for years and my boss of three years has one in our office. I finally had a little exra money to buy this particular one. It works great. Saves me so much time and effort from the old hand held hole punch. Can punch 100 pages very quickly and putting documents into a binder is now a breeze and all these years I've used a hand punch 3 hole puncher and the holes tended to move so they were not uniformly punched and made presentation binders look sloppy. Not anymore. This product is worth every penny! Thank you Swingline.
customer_reviews.author: Patty P

customer_reviews.title: Great for most jobs!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I do moderate size jobs, but this makes it easier and more efficient to get the product packaged and in the binders quickly for my presentations and customers. I'm overall pleased with this and would only recommend something that can whole punch larger chunks of paper if you have huge jobs. But, most people will buy already punched paper in that case. this is great for all medium sized jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri C. Engler

customer_reviews.title: Not The Right Item.
customer_reviews.text: What we got was not what is advertised. We returned it after looking up the model number and noticing it was not a real swing line hole puncher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: So far this product works as expected. The holes are always punched through, and they line up perfectly. It's quick and easy to use. I'm not sure how many sheets you can hole punch at one time because I don't need it for large projects. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jean

customer_reviews.title: Swingline electric 3 hole punch
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 of these hole punches for the office and they have been very popular. We have large manual hole punches for large jobs but they can be difficult to operate at times, an electric punch is definitely preferable. This Swingline punch will punch 20 pages with ease over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Acespeeed

customer_reviews.title: A Teacher's Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: I had used this machine at our school and found it to be a blessing when I had to prepare papers for my students, their portfolios and my person records as well as organizing my resources in binders. I purchased this machine and was thrilled with the delivery time. I plugged the machine in and have already punched 1100 pages. I LOVE IT!! The price was very reasonable and, when having to chose between a cheaper, smaller unit and this one, it was priced low enough for me, a teacher, to be able to buy the bigger and better of the two units. I recommend this product to every teacher.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: but I am glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what took me so long to get one of these, but I am glad I did. It punches a great deal of sheets quickly. It's not silent, but very effective. I had my children punching holes in TONS of sheets one workday and it was getting tedious. I also had a lot of mess to clean. After borrowing a fellow teacher's electric hole punch, I had to have one. I don't regret this buy one bit. I got a good deal on a like new hole punch for $84.43. It seemed brand new to me.
customer_reviews.author: Modina

customer_reviews.title: My Like New one from Amazon Warehouse deals was D.O.A.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine if it's working properly. The one I tried to save money on by getting it through Amazon Warehouse deals was dead on arrival and I had to return it. The reviews on this are very good so I'm going to purchase a new one and not take a chance on getting a second-hand problem. The new price is fair and includes a warranty that insures that you got a good one. That's why even though I had back luck on a second-hand one, I still believe it's a great choice and product if purchased new -- a worth 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Overcharged and lied to about quality of used product.
customer_reviews.text: I was overcharged for this product as the condition was supposed to be very good but if while it works perfectly the hole puncher itself looks beat up. I will use this and not return but be careful on buying used. Make sure you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jones

customer_reviews.title: This has been a helpful addition to my personal office ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a helpful addition to my personal office space! It is not the primary hole punch that gets used the most, so I've not experienced the problems that others have re: weak hole punches, etc. However, we have a duplicate model in the main paper area. That model receives tremendous use, and has the missing/weak third hole punch every time. Appears that replacement is the only option once that begins to occur.
customer_reviews.author: Lark

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and works great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big time saver. I had to punch holes in about 2000 sheets of paper and our manual punch wasn’t cutting it. This made the job work by quick.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Salant

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong with this machine.
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our old Swingline with this new one, hoping for some relief, and we are have serious problems ever since getting the machine to release the paper after drilling, especially on the left side. This is true well under the 28 paper limit, as in even with just 10 sheets. I pulled out the debris stuck in the punch hole and that finally released this last jam, but it's never worked as it should. To top it off, the reverse button doesn't work at all. Not happy! At least I see that many people are, so maybe it's just this particular machine.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A.

customer_reviews.title: Save your wrists
customer_reviews.text: My paralegal was out sick last week so I had to put together my own motion and exhibits using the manual punch we had in the office. I assure you that will be the last time I use it as I detest physical labor, and while a two hole punch may not sound like "labor" but after punching holes in 500 pages of exhibits, I assure you it is. this gets the job done quickly and easily saving my delicate wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT 3 HOLE PUNCH
customer_reviews.text: This is a great punch. I have it set up next to my printer and use it all the time. It is easy to use and you don't have to worry about the punch holes begin off. It is easy to empty since the tray is in the front and just slides out. Everyone should have one of these and get rid of that awkward manual punch. It will pay for its self by saving paper and frustrations when the holes are off. I recommend this to to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: A Good product
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many manual hole punch gadgets. By far, I like this one. This electric paper hole punch works great for my classroom use. I've inserted anywhere from 1 to 25 sheets at a time. The three holes punched on the sheets of papers are Very Accurate and clean... However, the back panel to support the pile of papers to be punched can be better secured.
customer_reviews.author: P. E. Ng

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have had the 3 hole version of this punch for a couple of years. It has performed admirably. This replaces an older 2 hole model of another brand that was very slow and cumbersome to use. This Swingline is much faster and processes more sheets per punch. We have a small law pratice and there is a lot of paper to punch. This is a pain saver for hands and wrists that are becoming a bit arthritic.
customer_reviews.author: Semicolon

customer_reviews.title: Never a problem
customer_reviews.text: Beats the heck out of a manual hole punch. :-) Works like you would expect it to. No problems at all. Used it quite heavily while doing graduate research and creating binder after binder of material. Never let me down. That gets 5 stars in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Cordell C. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: this hole punch sounds like it's dying
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hole punch to replace an identical one that has lasted well over a decade. After a little over a month and limited use, this hole punch sounds like it's dying. It struggles to punch through 13 sheets but is supposed to handle up to 25. It is also leaving oil spots on the paper around the holes that it punches. It's 8 days past the return deadline...
customer_reviews.author: zombette

customer_reviews.title: Need a 3 hole punch...this should be it!
customer_reviews.text: I like how quickly I received my 3 hole punch. I do a lot of hole punching for binders and my job. It is great. No more fighting with the manual hole punchers to get the extra sheet of paper you tried to hold punch! Very satisfied customer!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Fast
customer_reviews.text: Our choir uses an electric hole punch to put holes in the music. The old one we had finally gave out. This Paper Punch does an excellent job. It has a strong motor, it's heavy enough to stay in place, and it punches holes so fast, it's hard to believe. I'm expecting this commercial strength hole punch to last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: J King

customer_reviews.title: We ordered this one as a replacement and it's working just fine.
customer_reviews.text: We had one in our middle school office that was probably 10+ years old and it finally succumbed to a paper jam. We ordered this one as a replacement and it's working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: StephTheTeach

customer_reviews.title: Hole in one
customer_reviews.text: I had one almost exactly like this for over 15 years....as soon as it died I purchased another. We work on a lot of volunteer events and keep notebooks so this is a must. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn R. Pardue

customer_reviews.title: Product does not work
customer_reviews.text: I have received the hole-punch, plugged it in and it does not work. Tried numerous outlets and nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this is the first electric hole punch I have used, so I can only compare it to the manual type. This thing is great! We had been killing our hands and arms punching holes in stacks and stacks of paper. And it also took so long. This electric hole punch takes more paper at one time and is so simple. If you punch lots of holes, this is well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Christie C.

customer_reviews.title: Church Organist/Piano Technician
customer_reviews.text: As a blind person, both in my church work, and my piano service company, I not only use printed material for my customers, but I also braille out materials needed for my church work in braille. This paper punch is _one awesome machine! It punches 28 sheets of heavy braille paper so I can pop it in my note book. If you need a reliable commercial heavy duty electric paper punch that keeps on groovin while the paper keeps movin, by all means! ya gots ta get this here bad boy. Lookie here, :-) I'd recommend this machine in a heartbeat. And Amazon? you make this even better with your low price. I _looooooooove buying from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Ray R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. I use it every day. Easy to use. Easy to clean. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: GTC

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This 3 hole punch is fantastic! I bought it and hole punched over 15,000 pages in just over 3 months with no issues and it's still going strong. Definitely worth the money! I like it so much I plan to buy my daughter's teacher one for her classroom next year!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hole puncher
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the office. Great hole puncher. Reliable. Punches many sheets of paper at once.
customer_reviews.author: waterlily

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased. I haven't used it to full capacity yet ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased. I haven't used it to full capacity yet but I do know that it will punch the holes in 20 copies at a time
customer_reviews.author: countess

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. A bit expensive, but if it holds up it will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Reader Renee

customer_reviews.title: I punch easily a ream of paper a week and every hole ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this for work, and it is well worth it. I punch easily a ream of paper a week and every hole is properly punched, and I can do so many sheets at once. A real time saver.
customer_reviews.author: Good to Goal

customer_reviews.title: I buy this product every time I'm transferred to a ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product every time I'm transferred to a new location. Pays for itself with increased productivity alone. Just remember to empty the tray in front every so often.
customer_reviews.author: Hops & Barley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing hole punch. I went through four others before I finally found this one.
customer_reviews.author: supersonic

customer_reviews.title: Great electric hole punch
customer_reviews.text: I love this electric hole punch. I was the best purchase for my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple efficiency!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. I use it everyday and it never misses. It works way better than the manual kind and is easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: DCM

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my office, and it gets a lot of use!! Worth the purchase and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shalom thompson

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality
customer_reviews.text: heavy duty. Price was much less than the exact same product on other sites.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Charm!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hole puncher! I use it every day in my classroom. The school has this exact hole puncher in our workrooms, but I wanted my own for my room. My students use it on a consistent basis and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M Davis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So handy, plug in and ready to use. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Received a different punch then one pictured
customer_reviews.text: I did not get the item pictured ., I received a black punch .. works great but not one I ordered
customer_reviews.author: SheShe

customer_reviews.title: A must have for office even for personal use.
customer_reviews.text: For personal of for office work, it is a must have if you want to organize your paper work with less effort. I really love being able to just push the button and wallah, done, clean cut holes.
customer_reviews.author: Bern

customer_reviews.title: I love this electric hole puncher for handling many pages at ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this electric hole puncher for handling many pages at once with ease. Once you try it, you are never going back to punching by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: commercial hole puncher
customer_reviews.text: i bought this because the two regular hole punchers made holes that were too small for practical use and flipping pages was impossible. this is not as fast or quiet as the one we use at my work but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: sunnypreposition

customer_reviews.title: Buy this paper punch
customer_reviews.text: After buying several paper punches, none of which were cheap, I bought this one. Pros: There is no more frustration with jammed paper, mis-punches, annoying paper punch devices. This thing works every time, all the time. I am familiar with it from a library where I spend a lot of my time. I figured if it were good enough to handle high volume use in a library, certainly it would hold up at home. This is the case, and I recommend the product to anyone. Cons: None You won't regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: WOW!  Love this machine!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this machine--fast, efficient, and quiet. Wish I'd bought it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Cavenaugh

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed. Didn't even punch through 10 pages. SUPER noisy. Returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Crosby

customer_reviews.title: The 3 hold punch works fantastically. This was replace ...
customer_reviews.text: The 3 hold punch works fantastically. This was replace another unit purchased 3 years ago and I hope this one works just as long.
customer_reviews.author: K. McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: It totally lived up to expectations. It punches the holes quickly and precisely. It is very easy to use. It is small enough so that it does not take up much room. What is there not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: works great, but
customer_reviews.text: This hole punch work great, but it tends to collect chads in the center hole punch, that you have to clean out occasionally. that why it only got a 4 rating.
customer_reviews.author: miles

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty!  Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It is the best hole puncher I have ever used. I bought this for my classroom and students I don't even know will ask to come use it.
customer_reviews.author: EEW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Electric Hole Punch
customer_reviews.text: My wife used this model electric hole punch at her office and after she retired wanted one at home to sort out and file her papers, newsletter, etc., in binders. This device works perfectly and the price was much lower than other sources.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D. Kaskin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellently made. This one is replacing a Swingline just like it purchased 5-yrs ago.
customer_reviews.author: DTSmith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this punch! Helps me get my work done faster!
customer_reviews.author: Pattypicks

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: paper sometimes sticks because of the tubes that punch the hole does not release.
customer_reviews.author: Richla Strauss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I use it in the classroom daily, and it is reliable. Just don't overfill it
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: I love my three hole punch
customer_reviews.text: I love my three hole punch! The only problem I had was that it arrived two days later than what was promised through prime shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Hope M. Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Paper guide great, holes are clean
customer_reviews.text: Works efficiently, used multiple times a day. Minimal sound. Paper guide great, holes are clean, size fits in smaller spaces well. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hole punch to use in my classroom. It easily punches an entire class's handouts at once and saves me lots of time and hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Just as promised
customer_reviews.text: after shoulder surgery requested this from owner to do manuals-of course he said yes and we couldn't be happier smoothe, efficient and OSHA should have a look at it
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. My secretary loves it. It has worked flawlessly so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Perfect for an office
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Perfect for an office. Other reviews say it is loud, which it kind of is, but nothing that is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: af_marie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job in hole punching and I would finish my work when using this much quicker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It just works great. Be st product ever made
customer_reviews.text: It just works great. Be st product ever made. A little large, but it works fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: aba

customer_reviews.title: 3-Hole Punching Made Easy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because we have a lot of paperwork that needs to be filed in notebooks. This makes the job so much easier than manual punches.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Porter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: OK, now can you make a swingline that punches 2 top of the page holes electrically.
customer_reviews.author: Teskoo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is my second one for another office, have used it for years with no problems
customer_reviews.author: coyote17007

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE the Swingline Paper Punch!!!
customer_reviews.text: I volunteer at an elementary school in my town and there is a Swingline Paper Punch in the main office. I mostly work with a Literacy Coach on the second floor and I decided to donate a paper punch for her office. There is an abundance of copying tests, etc. for the students. We love it and the teachers on that floor are very happy we have a paper punch on that floor. I would STRONGLY recommend this item. Thank you, Sallie Luchese
customer_reviews.author: Sallie A. Luchese

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is always on top
customer_reviews.text: It works good if not better then the ratings say It has not prob. with 30 sheets at once. The only flaw I would change is the start button could be on the right side instead of left. It would make it easier and faster load paper then instead of reaching over paper u just move down on the left side. P. S. none could come close to the price I received the nears price was $25 moreRoy DeSetto
customer_reviews.author: roydesetto

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I needed this for my classroom because ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I needed this for my classroom because we are using binders this year. Everything we do needs to be 3-hole punched. This makes it simpler for me.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I used this in someone else's office and had to have one
customer_reviews.text: This electric hole punch is easy and accurate. I especially appreciate that it handles quite a few pages at once.

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for school classroom - holding up to 5th graders well! The kids love it & the teacher is happy!

customer_reviews.title: 3 hole punch
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. It performs as stated and is what I expected for the job. I have no complaints about this product.

customer_reviews.title: The hole punch is great and I would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: The hole punch is great and I would recommend it. ACCO is a different story. The site is not user friendly so checking on the status of an order is very frustrating. Not to mention the fact that they seem to take a long time in fulfilling their orders.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Morris

customer_reviews.title: Work Horse
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. It gets a lot of use in our library. Students of all shapes and sizes use it. We have pounders, pressers and light toughers and It has held up really well.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Automatic 3-hole punch
customer_reviews.text: Swingline makes excellent products. They are made to last. Easy to operate and easy access to discarded chad.The unit is quiet and performs exactly as stated.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a great little machine to have in the busy classroom
customer_reviews.author: Katy’s iPhone7 app

customer_reviews.title: Good design and very functional
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this whole punch. The fact that you can punch holes in up to 28 sheets of paper at a time is very convenient. I despise manual whole punches as they generally punch the holes poorly and can only punch holes through about 5 sheets of paper at a time. I develop training materials and this device is very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: UofA School of Social Work

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I had used this paper punch in a previous office, Now that I'm working from home, I wanted one of my own.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great product Rarely doesn’t punch typically pushing 20-25 pages through ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product Rarely doesn’t punch typically pushing 20-25 pages through at a time Swingline great old school company

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this hole puncher and so do my students. Very durable
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Our office purchased this particular item because we heard such good feedback from another department that already had one. So far it is working great. The hole punches come out clean and it hasn't jammed once. I also like that the instructions on how to operate are displayed right on the front of the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad that I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a manual hole punch for years and was so tired of it! When the last one started jamming all of the time I decided to try an electric one. I love it! It will save my arm and my peace of mind. I punch a lot of holes for my work and am so glad to have that part of my job easier and less frustrating. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: b.roberts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the office
customer_reviews.text: The best hole punch for a busy office. Very sturdy and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Diamondfreak

customer_reviews.title: Best electric hole punch
customer_reviews.text: Bought two one for each office they are so good
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Paper Punch Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This product works well, but is loud. It sounds as though there's a gear loose. However, it works well and I love the efficiency of the amount this can hold. Overall, I'd recommend wholeheartedly!
customer_reviews.author: Krissta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It gives a clean punch. Able to do more sheets of paper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swingline Stapler
customer_reviews.text: Received as described. Works great. Easier than using a hand-operated punch. Worth the cost if you have weak hands or lots of paper to punch,.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Neumueller

customer_reviews.title: Great investment.
customer_reviews.text: Works with the ease of a single finger. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

product_meta.title: Swingline Electric 3 Hole Punch, Commercial Hole Puncher, 28 Sheet Punch Capacity, Platinum (74535)
product_meta.description:
Style:3 HoleThis high-performance, Swingline Commercial Electric Punch with fixed punch heads is fast and reliable. Automatic jam reverse ensures trouble-free punching with fewer disruptions. Punches through as many as 28 sheets of paper, creating precise 9/32" holes. Precisely engineered for smooth function with less noise disruption, it’s an excellent choice for shared workspaces and quiet offices. Mess is minimized with a built-in plastic chip tray that slides in and out of the base. It stores paper scraps until you're ready to dispose of them. Punch with a simple press of the capacitive touch screen. Built-in vertical paper guide for easy punching. Black and gray design complements any décor. Swingline stands behind this high-quality punch with a Limited Lifetime 2 Year Warranty and a 100% Performance Guarantee.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Swingline
feature_bullets: JAM RESISTANT & EFFICIENT – Auto jam reverse ensures trouble-free punching with fewer disruptions. Ideal for high-volume projects, this electric punch delivers quick and efficient punching.
28-SHEET CAPACITY – Punches through as many as 28 sheets of paper, creating precise 9/32" holes. Fixed punch heads for reliable operation.
LESS NOISE – Precisely engineered for smooth function with less noise disruption, it’s an excellent choice for shared workspaces and quiet offices
LESS MESS – Mess is minimized with a built-in plastic chip tray that slides in and out of the base. It stores paper scraps until you're ready to dispose of them.
EASE OF USE – Punch with a simple press of the capacitive touch screen. Built-in vertical paper guide for easy punching. Black and gray design complements any décor.
BUILT TO LAST – Swingline stands behind this high-quality, silver punch with a Limited Lifetime 2 Year Warranty and a 100% Performance Guarantee.
